Smart Home Security Systems

With Livicom's smart security products, you can easily manage your home and business with convenient mobile applications and an easy to use user interface. You can also enjoy the peace of mind that comes from knowing your property is protected by state of the art technology.

Safety is important at home, so it's essential that your smart Security system detect intruders in real time. It also alerts you if there is a break in, or if the alarm goes off by itself. If there is a break in, your security system will notify the police, while also letting you know where the break in occurred. If your Smart Security system detects motion outside of your home, it sends a push alert to your phone so you know there is someone outside.

Cutting Edge Smart Surveillance System

Livicom's smart surveillance system services are built on top of cutting edge technology and cloud-based systems so that we can stay ahead of the curve and meet the needs of customers all over the country. We believe smart technology should be simple to use so that you can save time while still getting the best possible security for your property. Our products are easy to set up and operate; our cloud-based systems are available on any device including smartphones, laptops, tablets or desktops.


Mobile applications for smart security systems let you monitor activity on your properties from anywhere so that you can keep up with everything at home or work while on the go. We give our customers peace of mind by offering 24 hour access with live monitoring capabilities between Livicom's systems and their mobile devices throughout the day, even when you're not in front of them!

Livicom offers a variety of customizable security systems for homeowners and commercial property owners alike, as well as a variety of connected devices and accessories that will make your life easier when it comes to protecting what matters most to you most! All Transfer Expert products are backed by a comprehensive two-year warranty for added peace of mind when it comes to protecting your property.
